title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The report displays the same results regardless of the dynamic text element's Content Type property setting (Auto, Plain, or HTML).
EB:
I expect the following results based on the Content Type property setting:

- For Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed.
- For Auto, I expect all three contents (1, 2, and 3) to appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, I expect contents 1 and 2 to appear properly without any HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.

Please refer to the attached report for more details.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Prepare a database field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html> ... </html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
